price: បន្ទាប់មកគេដើរសំដៅទៅរកព្រះនានារបស់ពួកគេ ហើយ បានពោលថាៈ តើពួកឯងមិនបរិភោគទេឬ?
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
